description: Triangle read by rows: number of connected graphs with k >= 0 edges and n nodes (1<=n<=k+1).
comments: The diagonal n = k+1 is A000055(n). - _Jonathan Vos Post_, Aug 10 2008
references: G. A. Baker et al., High-temperature expansions for the spin-1/2 Heisenberg model, Phys. Rev., 164 (1967), 800-817.
F. Harary and E. M. Palmer, Graphical Enumeration, Academic Press, NY, 1973, p. 93, Table 4.2.2; p. 241, Table A2.
example: 1; 0 1; 0 0 1; 0 0 1 2; 0 0 0 2 3; 0 0 0 1 5 6; ... (so with 5 edges there's 1 graph with 4 nodes, 5 with 5 nodes and 6 with 6 nodes). [Typo corrected by Anders Haglund, Jul 08 2008]
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
